ai.summary: A gentle 0.7 km woodland stroll at Lowry's Wood Walk near Strangford Lough in Northern Ireland. An easy, family-friendly route through mature trees with occasional glimpses of the water, ideal for a short nature break.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat, well-maintained woodland paths with short boardwalk sections. Mostly level and easy underfoot, but expect occasional roots and muddy patches after rain; some shaded stretches and low gradients.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths. Check local weather before you go; coastal areas can be windy and rain is common in the UK. Wear sturdy footwear, bring layers and a waterproof jacket, and keep children and pets close. Have a charged phone and basic first aid; avoid slippery edges near the water.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light boots
Phone with offline map or map of the area
ai.best_seasons: All year round; best in spring and summer when the wildlife is active and trails are typically dry.

seo.title: Lowry's Wood Walk, Strangford Lough – Easy 0.7 km Woodland Trail in Northern Ireland
seo.meta_description: Discover Lowry's Wood Walk near Strangford Lough. A short, easy 0.7 km hike in Northern Ireland with flat paths, woodland scenery, and family-friendly appeal.
